column5: My cabin is a hidden gem in Parkdale/Urbandale, a neighborhood only 15 minutes from downtown and filled with unique architecture, old trees, and multicultural flavor. Made from hand-planed cedar, the cabin has a wonderful smell and unique aesthetic. It feels like a woodcutter's home deep in the woods, yet sits safely in my verdant backyard. Covered parking onsite is removed from the road and secure. Come spend a couple of days among the trees!
column8: Charming Cabin Near Deep Ellum & Fair Park
